item.title: Going Public: From Los Angeles To RailsConf 2008
item.description: With the high cost (and carbon!) of transportation, as well as the burden of the increased time it takes to fight your way through the congestion, we all need to change the way that we navigate thru our daily lives. I had decided to take public transportation to get from my house in Los Angeles, to RailsConf 2008 in Portland, OR. When I first mentioned my plans, several friends and family members were incredulous.
